title: Sony TVs 2018: what you need to know before you buy Bravia
description: ![Sony Bravia2017]()**Sony WE66, WE61** : The WE6 series is a bit of an odd one. It’s divided intoWE66 and WE61. Basically the WE66 describes the 49 and 40 inch models, whichare Full HD at 1080p. The WE61 is 32 inches and is HD ready.This series maintains the smart functionality (and HDR streaming capabilities)but loses out on the Triluminos display.**Sony RE4** : I never thought I’d see a no-frills TV feature HDR, but here itis. The RE4 is a straight-up HD TV with no internet or streaming capabilities.But it does play nicely with your PS4’s HDR games._And that’s it for the Sony 2018 models we know about so far. I’ll be updatingthis page when I hear more. Meanwhile, check out my coverage of the 2017models below, many of which are still being sold in 2018.
